title: Streaming companies forced to slow speeds, lower quality
text: CNBC's Julia Boorstin breaks down how internet speeds are slowing as more people work from home amid the coronavirus pandemic.

title: Facebook launches a global version of its Community Help feature in response to the COVID-19 pandemic
text: Facebook first launched its Community Help feature in 2017, to give users a way to offer assistance, search for and receive help in the wake of a crisis.

title: Facebook rolls out tool to make it easier to help during the coronavirus outbreak
text: The social network's users are asking for money, food and other supplies.

title: 7 Strong Media Stocks to Buy on the Coronavirus Dip
text: These strong media stocks have been beaten and bruised by the coronavirus pandemic. But they could rebound big once the outbreak passes.

title: Facebook Makes It Easier for Users to See All the Data It Collects
text: Facebook expanded the amount of data users can access in a bid to be more transparent.

title: Facebook (FB) Signs Agreement With AR Display Maker Plessey
text: Facebook (FB) signs exclusive deal with British device manufacturer Plessey Semiconductors Ltd. to aid AR wearables development.

title: Facebook (FB) Offers $100M for Coronavirus-Hit News Outlets
text: Facebook (FB) recently announced a $100 million investment for local news organizations hit by loss in ad revenues due to the coronavirus pandemic.

title: Should I Buy Facebook Stock Right Now?
text: The broad market sell-off could be a buying opportunity for long-term investors interested in this social media company.
